description.para: Displays the top n lines of file or the input.

param.param_note: Displays the first n lines, the default is 10
Name of the file to be checked

remarks.para: If no file name is specified in the parameter, then the input content is displayed.If file name is specified, then the input content is ignored.
When displaying multiple files, the file name is printed before the content of each file.

example.eg_note: Displays the first 3 lines of content of the file file1.txt . Output the result:
example.eg_result: the 1st line in file1. the 2nd line in file1. the 3rd line in file1.

example.eg_note: Displays the first line of file file1.txt and file2.txt . Output the result:
example.eg_result:
==> file1 <== the 1st line in file1.txt.
==> file2 <== the 1st line in file2.txt.
